nodes.html: Self-service data preparation with Tableau Prep Builder and Prep Conductor

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.1

nodes.html: In many organizations, data prep is reserved for people who have specialized skills, the data engineers and data scientists in your company. Only once the data is prepared can analysts and business users start performing their analysis.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.1

nodes.html: Tableau Prep changes this by empowering your entire organization to prepare data faster and more intuitively than ever before. It gives your team the tools they need to confidently combine, shape, and clean their data for faster time to insight and better business decisions.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.1

nodes.html: Tableau Prep is comprised of two products: Tableau Prep Builder for building your data flows, and Tableau Prep Conductor for sharing flows and managing them across the organization.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: Combine, shape, and clean your data for analysis

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21

nodes.html: A complete picture of your data

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

nodes.html: Three coordinated views let you see row-level data, profiles of each column, and your entire data preparation process. Pick which view to interact with based on the task at hand.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

nodes.html: Tableau Prep Builder is part of Tableau Creator. See offerings and pricing.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 20.11
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.1
Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

nodes.html: Use smart features to fix common data prep challenges. Tableau Prep Builder employs fuzzy clustering to turn repetitive tasks, like grouping by pronunciation, into one click operations.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 20.11
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.1
Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

nodes.html: Stay in the flow of your analysis. It’s easy to open your output with Tableau Desktop or share it with others via Tableau Server or Tableau Online. Easy sharing reduces friction and helps you bridge the gap between data preparation and analytics, for better business results.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 17.61

nodes.html: Learn how to effectively manage self-service data prep in your organization.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 20.11

nodes.html: Schedule, monitor and administer your data flows

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 20.11

nodes.html: Share and run flows on your server

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.1

nodes.html: With Tableau Prep Conductor, you can easily publish and run flows in your server environment. Share your data sources securely using Tableau Server or Tableau Online. Create an environment where everyone in your organization can work with prepped and up-to-date data.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.1

nodes.html: Tableau Prep Conductor is part of the Data Management Add-on.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

nodes.html: Schedule your flows to run when you need them to - day or night. Automate your data prep processes so there's always fresh data that's prepped and ready for analysis.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 20.11
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.1

nodes.html: Monitor flows with the same tools available on Tableau Server today. Use the Status page, Admin Views and run histories to see the health of flows across the entire server so you can address any issues quickly. Always know if your flows are healthy with proactive alerts.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

nodes.html: Already use Tableau? You'll feel right at home with Tableau Prep. Tableau Prep uses Tableau’s data connectors, calculation language, user permissions and administration views, so you can get going quickly.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

nodes.html: Enjoy fast interactions and flow execution with Hyper, our patent pending data engine technology. Hyper uses proprietary parallelism techniques to accelerate the data prep process.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

nodes.html: Learn, connect and enjoy Tableau with more than 150,000 passionate users. Rely on forums, events, and user groups to extend your Tableau Prep knowledge. Join the Tableau Community today.

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 21
Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

nodes.html: Tableau's software moves as fast as you do and we are constantly releasing new features. We invest more in R&D than anyone else in the industry, so there's always a new release around the corner.
